rules_text:
Interlink with Eunie, Ouroboros Medic [i](You can have both creatures be your commanders. Melds with that creature.)[/i]
{GU}: Create a 0/1 blue Mondo artifact creature token with “This creature can’t block” and “At the beginning of each end step, if this creature is tapped, sacrifice it.”
 Tap an untapped Mondo you control: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
